mapper.select:
select B.*, M.mem_nick from review_blind B inner join review R on B.review_no = R.review_no left outer join mem M on R.mem_no = M.mem_no where review_isblind = '1'
and instr(mem_nick, #{keyword}) > 0
order by review_blind_no desc

select R.*, M.mem_nick, M.mem_level, coalesce(B.cnt, 0) mem_review_cnt from review R left outer join mem M on R.mem_no = M.mem_no left outer join( select mem_no, count(mem_no) cnt from review group by mem_no )B on R.mem_no = B.mem_no where R.review_no = #{reviewNo}
select report_start_time from review_blind where review_no = #{reviewNo} and review_isblind = '1'
mapper.update: update review_blind set review_isblind = '2', blind_clear_time = sysdate where review_no = #{reviewNo} and review_isblind = '1'
